question: Which state government is to set up District Investment Promotion Agencies (DIPAs)?
explanation:
The Odisha government announced the setting up of District Investment Promotion Agencies (DIPAs) in 30 districts.
The DIPAs will operate under the leadership of the District Collector with other district officials including SPs. The DIPAs will be housed at the District Collectorate and will seek to promote local entrepreneurship and investment.
